com.mlt.mkt.chart

Class InfoPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.Control
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.Pane
        • com.mlt.desktop.control.GridBagPane
          • com.mlt.mkt.chart.InfoPane

  • public class InfoPane
extends GridBagPane
    A panel located at the top of the container, aimed to contain an info panel and necessary controls like the close button.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
